nodes.text: The Holwuff were a species native to the planet Alliga, controlling powerful corporate interests.
They were represented in the Galactic Senate of the Republic by Rogwa Wodrata, and later joined the Confederacy of Independent Systems when Wodrata defected prior to the First Battle of Geonosis.
A Holwuff's upper appendages were very similar in appearance to those of the Sy Myrthians. They were large, furry aliens, and their eyes were black. Two small tusks protruded from the upper jaw.

Once members of the Galactic Republic, the Holwuffs were represented by Senator Rogwa Wodrata in the Galactic Senate. Shortly before the First Battle of Geonosis, they seceded from the Republic and joined the Confederacy of Independent Systems.
